'''Beta 1.2.6.2''' (also known as 1.2.6 build 1) is the first and only build released for [[Bedrock Edition 1.2.6|1.2.6]] that added new features.<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360004165391|title=Minecraft Xbox One/Win 10/Android Beta - 1.2.6}}</ref> This is the final beta released in 2017.

== Changes ==
* Updated look for [[horse]]s, [[donkey]]s, [[mule]]s, [[skeleton horse]]s and [[zombie horse]]s.
